title: I need help with a font
content:
Hello everyone,  
Can anyone help me guess this font?

Thank you,  
Hala

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140316im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mustang_4743.jpg)

Font: 

 Varsity 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140316/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: Primehunter

comments.content:
This seems to be a compressed use of a popular font -- over two million downloads -- called [Varsity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140316/http:/www.dafont.com/varsity-regular.font?text=MUSTANGS&back=theme).  
Also very close is [Collegiate FLF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140316/http:/www.dafont.com/font-comment.php?file=collegiateflf&text=MUSTANGS&back=theme).  
Don
